EmailTemplate.subject: The leaves are dropping...and so are the prices!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=Inventory_sextupled]]> <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/editor-s-choice.html]]> Hi, {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}
Honeywell Aerospace Trading (HAT) is making room for more inventory and Turbo Fan Engine (TFE) parts are getting cleared off the shelf. Visit GoDirect™ Trade <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/WQ0EoZIjq0K2XGh00d0B000]]> today, find the part you want and checkout within 60 seconds or less. Use promo code 10OFF and get 10% off your total cart at checkout (minimum $200 order on Honeywell Aerospace Trading product only). Sign in now and see why Forbes, The Wall Street Journal and Yahoo! Finance are all talking about our marketplace.
SHOP THE TFE SALE <https://www.godirecttrade.com/editor-s-choice.html>
Best regards,
Neil Campbell TFE Product Line Manager GoDirectTrade.com <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/Q00X0BI0QM2qd0ZEG00qjh0]]>
